sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) is having a moment ... and not exactly a good one.

title: Cawthorn primary challengers respond after lawmaker calls Zelensky 'a thug'

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) admitted claims he had made about his colleagues inviting him to orgies and doing cocaine in front of him were exaggerated,? House Speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) said after admonishing the freshman congressman, according to multiple reports.
author: William Vaillancourt
title: Turns Out Noted Liar Madison Cawthorn May Have Also Been Lying About Getting Invited to a Congressional Orgy

sentence: The names have become familiar Reps. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), who called Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky a thug,? Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.), Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) and Lauren Boebert (R-Colo.).
title: Post Politics Now Biden to highlight postal reform as focus continues on accomplishments

sentence: Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) and a PAC aligned with him have helped Chuck Edwards, a primary challenger of embattled Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
title: Post Politics Now Biden issues first pardons, commutations of his presidency

sentence: EXCLUSIVE Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated federal insider trading laws as he hyped up an alleged pump-and-dump cryptocurrency scheme, multiple watchdog groups told the Washington Examiner.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Madison Cawthorn implicated in potential insider trading scheme, experts say
